SELECT o.goodsName AS 'goodsName' , o.goodsUnit AS 'goodsUnit' , o.purchasePrice AS 'purchasePrice' , o.sellingPrice AS 'sellingPrice' , w.goodsQuantity AS 'goodsQuantity' , s.storageName AS 'storageName' , s.storageClass AS 'storageClass' , s.storageArea AS 'storageArea' , s.businessRegDate AS 'businessRegDate' FROM k4_tb_order AS o JOIN k4_tb_warehousing AS w ON o.orderCode = w.orderCode JOIN k4_tb_storage AS s ON w.stNum = s.stNum
LIMIT #{startNum}, #{rowPerPage};

SELECT o.goodsName AS 'goodsName' , o.goodsUnit AS 'goodsUnit' , o.sellingPrice AS 'sellingPrice' , s.storageName AS 'storageName' , s.storageClass AS 'storageClass' , s.storageArea AS 'storageArea' , w.goodsQuantity AS 'goodsQuantity' , IFNULL(d.displaystandName,'') AS 'displaystandName' , d.goodsQuantity AS 'goodsQuantity' FROM k4_tb_order AS o JOIN k4_tb_warehousing AS w ON o.orderCode = w.orderCode JOIN k4_tb_storage AS s ON w.stNum = s.stNum INNER JOIN k4_tb_storagedisplay AS d ON w.bringInCode = d.bringInCode
LIMIT #{startNum}, #{rowPerPage};
